name: The Money Shift Game
blurb: Find your calling while figuring out how to get more out of life. Remember life is a game, you just weren\u2019t given instructions!

rewards.reward: THANK YOU to end all thank you-s: The most gracious thank you letter known to man. We'll shower you with glittery praise and you will feel wrapped up in our love like a warm blanket.

Does "first" mean anything to you? With a $5 donation you'll get a thank you email...AND...you'll be included in the first release. Jump to the front of the line and get your game sooner with this level.

Donate a 10 spot and get a special 10 point survey on a list of topics that will help us design the game!\r\n\r\nOh, and of COURSE this comes with a glowing thank you email that is just as effusive as the $1 one, only now with an ocean-breeze scent.

+FACEBOOK LOVE  We'll post your picture and your name in our community Facebook page for a donation of $15. Donate the $15 and have the option to have your name and picture posted as a donor/supporter!

NAME A CAREER that we will use in the game. Are you a daring dog catcher from Detroit? Or perhaps a heralded hair stylist from Houston? YOU can name a career that will be part of the game. This is your chance to contribute at a lower level threshold. Seize the day like a proper poet from Providence!

HOMETOWN HERO is what you'll be once you pledge $50 towards the completion of the game! Your reward is that YOUR TOWN is included in the game! That's right, take some civic pride and immortalize your village, city or settlement forever in the game.

Is your pet more like a family member than a pet? Well this level is for YOU! Pledge $60 and we will name a pet in the game after your little snookums. This is a limited level, only available to the first 25 pledges so hurry and snatch these up!

This one we like to call "Band Geek Revenge." YOU can name a High School activity that we will include in the game. Were you a savvy saxophonist? Or perhaps you were in the A/V club...or you were on the Football team. NOW you can subject someone else to the activity that YOU did in the game!
NAME a vacation destination that you love, or always wanted to visit and we will put it in the game! We hear that Fiji is beautiful this time of year...and you don't have to lose your luggage.

NAME a school mascot to be used in the game. Do bulldogs do something for you? Perhaps you feel a kinship with banana slugs? (Yes that's a mascot. Really.) Pledge $95 and you can name YOUR mascot to be included in the game. Win in the classroom. Win on the field. Win in the game! (Oh so much WIN!)
NAME a COLLEGE OR UNIVERSITY to be in the game. Want to see your alma mater matter? Be the envy of your rivals and rub their noses in your school colors.
GET an AUTOGRAPHED COPY OF THE BOARD GAME and be the envy of all of your friends. This is the original board game that The Money Shift video game is based on.
Be the hero to a school of your choice. We will send 6 COPIES of THE MONEY SHIFT board game to any school you choose. Teach the next generation how to manage money and life in a fun way.

BE A TESTER of the game during the production process. You can be a part of the team that determines the final features, look and feel of the game. Your input, plus a credit equals an awesome opportunity for you. Plus, you can brag to your friends that you were part of the team that brought the game to the public!

BE PART of the CHARACTER DESIGN TEAM and help design the characters from what they look like, their backstories, and what personalities they have. This is one of the most exclusive levels we offer, and gives you the opportunity to receive credit (win) and contribute to a game (big win)!

BE A CHARACTER in the game. That's right, your lovely visage will be permanently part of the The Money Shift game! We will use your likeness to create the iconic characters in the game. This is an exclusive and limited pledge level, so act now and show your mom that you made something of your life.

So Mr. Big Shot, you want to be part of the advisory board for the game's community network, and have your say? Well step up then this is the pledge level for you!  This is the most exclusive offer to be a part of The Money Shift.
